option_displayNotifications_description.description: An option description on the Preferences screen

option_catchUnhandledProtocols_title.description: An option title on the Preferences screen

option_catchUnhandledProtocols_descripti.message: Enables support for ipfs://$cid, ipns://$peerid and dweb:/ipfs/$cid by normalizing links and requests done with unhandled protocols
option_catchUnhandledProtocols_descripti.description: An option description on the Preferences screen

option_linkify_title.description: An option title on the Preferences screen

option_dnslink_title.description: An option title on the Preferences screen

option_preloadAtPublicGateway_title.description: An option title on the Preferences screen

option_preloadAtPublicGateway_descriptio.message: Enables automatic preload of uploaded assets via asynchronous HTTP HEAD request to a Public Gateway
option_preloadAtPublicGateway_descriptio.description: An option description on the Preferences screen

option_dnslink_description.message: Perform DNS lookup for every visited website and use Custom Gateway if DNSLINK is present in its DNS TXT record (known to slow down the browser)
option_dnslink_description.description: An option description on the Preferences screen

option_resetAllOptions_title.description: An option title and button label on the Preferences screen

option_resetAllOptions_description.message: Replaces user preferences with default ones (can't be undone!)
option_resetAllOptions_description.description: An option description on the Preferences screen
